mapper.select: SELECT a.ACT_DAT,a.TLR_ID,a.INV_TYP,a.IV_BEG_NO,a.IV_END_NO,b.TOL_NUM,b.REG_TLR, SUM(bigint(case when a.STL_FLG='U' then a.STL_NUM else '0' end)) as LOD_NUM, SUM(bigint(case when a.STL_FLG='0' then a.STL_NUM else '0' end)) as USE_NUM, SUM(bigint(case when a.STL_FLG='1' then a.STL_NUM else '0' end)) as CLR_NUM, (bigint(b.TOL_NUM)-SUM(bigint(case when a.STL_FLG!='U' then a.STL_NUM else '0' end))) as INV_NUM FROM ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_INV_TXN_INF as a ,${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_INV_DTL_BOK as b WHERE a.NODNO=#{br,jdbcType=CHAR} and (a.ACT_DAT between #{begDat,jdbcType=CHAR} and #{endDat,jdbcType=CHAR}) and a.INV_TYP=b.INV_TYP and a.IV_BEG_NO=b.IV_BEG_NO and a.IV_END_NO=b.IV_END_NO GROUP BY a.ACT_DAT,a.TLR_ID,a.INV_TYP,a.IV_BEG_NO,a.IV_END_NO,b.TOL_NUM,b.REG_TLR ORDER BY ACT_DAT,TLR_ID

SELECT NODNO,TLR_ID,INV_TYP, SUM(bigint(case when STL_FLG='U' then STL_NUM else '0' end)) as LOD_NUM, SUM(bigint(case when STL_FLG='0' then STL_NUM else '0' end)) as USE_NUM, SUM(bigint(case when STL_FLG='1' then STL_NUM else '0' end)) as CLR_NUM FROM ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_INV_TXN_INF WHERE NODNO=#{br,jdbcType=CHAR} and (ACT_DAT between #{begDat,jdbcType=CHAR} and #{endDat,jdbcType=CHAR}) GROUP BY NODNO,TLR_ID,INV_TYP ORDER BY NODNO,TLR_ID,INV_TYP

SELECT QY_NO,SUM(bigint(STL_NUM)) as USE_NUM FROM ${GDEUPSB_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_INV_TXN_INF WHERE NODNO=#{br,jdbcType=CHAR} and (ACT_DAT between #{begDat,jdbcType=CHAR} and #{endDat,jdbcType=CHAR}) and STL_FLG='0' GROUP BY QY_NO ORDER BY QY_NO
